alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 19 at 5:23AM EST until February 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.7 feet this morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 5 pm EST.
